overview: In costal metropolitan Shenzhen, a student, coming from the countryside, forgot to fill in his student number in one of the exams that would determine his high school. His mother, a housemaid, tried to negotiate with the school. The next day, the school dean was found killed. As the murder case grew more and more confusing, the mother and the son both became more and more anxious...
title: Flaming Trees by the Sea
